body.p: Indiana governor. Salisbury, Indiana, native. Son of James Throck Morton and Sarah Morton. Married to Lucinda M. Burbank Morton. Attended Miami University in Oxford, Ohio. Admitted to the bar in Centreville, indiana, in 1847. Elected judge of the Sixth Circuit Court of Indiana in 1852. Unsuccessful Republican candidate for governor of Indiana in 1856. Elected lieutenant governor of Indiana on a ticket with Henry Lane in 1860. Governor of Indiana from 1861 to 1867.
